title: Commission Directive 90/206/EEC of 9 April 1990 amending the Annexes to Council Directive 70/524/EEC concerning additives in feedingstuffs
header:
COMMISSION  DIRECTIVE
of 9 April 1990
amending the Annexes to Council Directive 70/524/EEC concerning additives in feedingstuffs
(90/206/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annex II to Directive 70/524/EEC is hereby amended as set out in the Annex hereto.
This Directive is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 9 April 1990.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 270, 14. 12. 1970, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 67, 15. 3. 1990, p. 44.
(3) OJ No L 245, 12. 9. 1985, p. 1.
ANNEX
